Code.Description: Specific form of transit declaration issued by the exporter (movement certificate).

Code.Description: Certificate certifying the quantity of goods, services etc.

Code.Name: Corporate superannuation member maintenance message
Code.Description: Member maintenance message used for corporate superannuation schemes.

Code.Name: Industry superannuation member maintenance message
Code.Description: Member maintenance message used for industry wide superannuation schemes.

Code.Description: Payroll deductions advice used in the life insurance industry.

Code.Name: Cargo status

Code.Name: Inventory report

Code.Name: Passport
Code.Description: An official document giving permission to travel in foreign countries.

Code.Description: An official document giving permission to drive a car in a given country.

Code.Name: Driving licence (international)
Code.Description: An official document giving a native of one country permission to drive a vehicle in certain other countries.

Code.Name: Free pass
Code.Description: A document giving free access to a service.

Code.Name: Season ticket
Code.Description: A document giving access to a service for a determined period of time.

Code.Description: (1125) A message to report the transport status and/or change in the transport status (i.e. event) between agreed parties.

Code.Name: Transport status request
Code.Description: (1127) A message to request a transport status report (e.g. through the national multimodal status report message IFSTA).

Code.Description: A banking status document and/or message.

Code.Description: Document/message in which a declarant provides information about extra-Community trade of goods required by the body responsible for the collection of trade statistics. Trade by a country in the European Union with a country outside the European Union.

Code.Name: Written instructions in conformance with ADR article number
Code.Description: 10385 Written instructions relating to dangerous goods and defined in the European Agreement of Dangerous Transport by Road known as ADR (Accord europeen relatif au transport international des marchandises Dangereuses par Route).

Code.Description: Official certification that damages to the goods to be transported have been discovered.

Code.Description: A validated priced tender.

Code.Description: Report on the movement of containers or other items of transport equipment to record physical movement activity and establish the end of a rental period.

Code.Description: No shortage, surplus or damaged outturn resulting from container vessel unpacking.

Code.Description: Movement type indicator: goods are moved under customs control for warehousing due to being time-up.

Code.Description: Movement type indicator: goods are to move by sea under customs control to a customs office where formalities will be completed.

Code.Name: Treatment - personal effect
Code.Description: Cargo consists of personal effects.

Code.Name: Treatment - timber
Code.Description: Cargo consists of timber.

Code.Name: Preliminary credit assessment
Code.Description: Document/message issued either by a factor to indicate his preliminary credit assessment on a buyer, or by a seller to request a factor's preliminary credit assessment on a buyer.

Code.Name: Credit cover
Code.Description: Document/message issued either by a factor to give a credit cover on a buyer, or by a seller to request a factor's credit cover.

Code.Description: Document/message issued by a factor to indicate the money movements of a seller's or another factor's account with him.

Code.Name: Commercial dispute
Code.Description: Document/message issued by a party (usually the buyer) to indicate that one or more invoices or one or more credit notes are disputed for payment.

Code.Name: Chargeback
Code.Description: Document/message issued by a factor to a seller or to another factor to indicate that the rest of the amounts of one or more invoices uncollectable from buyers are charged back to clear the invoice(s) off the ledger.

Code.Name: Reassignment
Code.Description: Document/message issued by a factor to a seller or to another factor to reassign an invoice or credit note previously assigned to him.

Code.Name: Collateral account
Code.Description: Document message issued by a factor to indicate the movements of invoices, credit notes and payments of a seller's account.

Code.Name: Request for payment
Code.Description: Document/message issued by a creditor to a debtor to request payment of one or more invoices past due.

Code.Name: Unship permit
Code.Description: A message or document issuing permission to unship cargo.

Code.Name: Statistical definitions
Code.Description: Transmission of one or more statistical definitions.

Code.Name: Statistical data
Code.Description: Transmission of one or more items of data or data sets.

Code.Name: Request for statistical data
Code.Description: Request for one or more items or data sets of statistical data.

Code.Name: Call-off delivery
Code.Description: Document/message to provide split quantities and delivery dates referring to a previous delivery instruction.

Code.Name: Consignment status report
Code.Description: Message covers information about the consignment status.

Code.Name: Inventory movement advice
Code.Description: Advice of inventory movements.

Code.Name: Inventory status advice
Code.Description: Advice of stock on hand.

Code.Description: Document message used to provide credit information related to a transaction for goods or services to the relevant party.

Code.Description: Document message for providing credit information related to financial adjustments to the relevant party, e.g., bonuses.

Code.Description: Document/message for providing debit information related to financial adjustments to the relevant party.

Code.Description: A report identifying the cost performance on a contract that summarizes cost or schedule variances (format 5 - explanations and problem analysis).

Code.Description: An estimate based upon a detailed, quantity based specification (bill of quantity).

Code.Description: Instruction for the collection of the documentary credit.

Code.Name: Documentary credit amendment information
Code.Description: Documentary credit amendment information.

Code.Description: Advice of an amendment of a documentary credit.

Code.Description: Response to an amendment of a documentary credit.

Code.Description: Provides information on documentary credit issuance.

Code.Description: Document/message containing information needed to initiate the payment. It may cover the financial settlement for one or more commercial trade transactions. A payment order is an instruction to the ordered bank to arrange for the payment of one specified amount to the beneficiary.

Code.Name: Extended payment order
Code.Description: Document/message containing information needed to initiate the payment. It may cover the financial settlement for several commercial trade transactions, which it is possible to specify in a special payments detail part. It is an instruction to the ordered bank to arrange for the payment of one specified amount to the beneficiary.

Code.Description: Document/message containing a payment order to debit one or more accounts and to credit one or more beneficiaries.

Code.Name: Extended credit advice
Code.Description: Document/message sent by an account servicing institution to one of its account owners, to inform the account owner of an entry that has been or will be credited to its account for a specified amount on the date indicated. It provides extended commercial information concerning the relevant remittance advice.

The credit may or may not be confirmed by another bank.

In either case, the draft should comply with the specifications laid down for cheques in the country in which it is to be payable.

Code.Description: Order to connect a reefer container to a reefer point.

Code.Name: Bill of exchange
Code.Description: Document/message, issued and signed in conformity with the applicable legislation, which contains an unconditional order whereby the drawer directs the drawee to pay a definite sum of money to the payee or to his order, on demand or at a definite time, against the surrender of the document itself.

Code.Name: Promissory note
Code.Description: Document/message, issued and signed in conformity with the applicable legislation, which contains an unconditional promise whereby the maker undertakes to pay a definite sum of money to the payee or to his order, on demand or at a definite time, against the surrender of the document itself.

Code.Name: Statement of account message
Code.Description: Usage of STATAC-message.

Code.Name: Direct delivery (transport)
Code.Description: Document/message ordering the direct delivery of goods/consignment from one means of transport into another means of transport in one movement.

Code.Name: WCO second step of two-step export declaration
Code.Description: Second part of a simplified declaration, in accordance with the WCO Customs Data Model, to Customs by which goods are declared for Customs export procedure based on the 1999 Kyoto Convention.

Code.Name: WCO one-step import declaration
Code.Description: Single step declaration, in accordance with the WCO Customs Data Model, to Customs by which goods are declared for Customs import procedure based on the 1999 Kyoto Convention.

Code.Name: WCO first step of two-step import declaration
Code.Description: First part of a simplified declaration, in accordance with the WCO Customs Data Model, to Customs by which goods are declared for Customs import procedure based on the 1999 Kyoto Convention.

Code.Name: WCO second step of two-step import declaration
Code.Description: Second part of a simplified declaration, in accordance with the WCO Customs Data Model, to Customs by which goods are declared for Customs import procedure based on the 1999 Kyoto Convention.

Code.Name: Previous transport document
Code.Description: Identification of the previous transport document.

Code.Name: Insurance certificate
Code.Description: Document/message issued to the insured certifying that insurance has been effected and that a policy has been issued. Such a certificate for a particular cargo is primarily used when good are insured under the terms of a floating or an open policy; at the request of the insured it can be exchanged for a policy.

Code.Name: Special requirements permit related to the transport of
Code.Description: cargo A permit related to a transport document granting the transport of cargo under the conditions as specifically required.

Code.Name: Dangerous Goods Notification for Tanker vessel
Code.Description: Dangerous Goods Notification for a vessel carrying liquid cargo in bulk.

Code.Name: Dangerous Goods Notification for non-tanker vessel
Code.Description: Dangerous Goods Notification for a vessel carrying cargo other than bulk liquid cargo.

Code.Name: WCO Conveyance Arrival Report
Code.Description: Declaration, in accordance with the WCO Customs Data Model, to Customs regarding the conveyance arriving in a Customs territory.

Code.Name: WCO Conveyance Departure Report
Code.Description: Declaration, in accordance with the WCO Customs Data Model, to Customs regarding the conveyance departing a Customs territory.

Code.Name: Accounting voucher
Code.Description: A document/message justifying an accounting entry.

Code.Name: Self billed debit note
Code.Description: A document which indicates that the customer is claiming debit in a self billing environment.

Code.Name: Military Identification Card
Code.Description: The official document used for military personnel on travel orders, substituting a passport.

Code.Name: Re-Entry Permit
Code.Description: A permit to re-enter a country.

Code.Name: Insurance policy
Code.Description: Document/message issued by the insurer evidencing an agreement to insure and containing the conditions of the agreement concluded whereby the insurer undertakes for a specific fee to indemnify the insured for the losses arising out of the perils and accidents specified in the contract.

Code.Name: Refugee Permit
Code.Description: Document identifying a refugee recognized by a country.

Code.Name: Forwarder�s credit note
Code.Description: Document/message for providing credit information to the relevant party.

Code.Name: Original accounting voucher
Code.Description: To indicate that the document/message justifying an accounting entry is original.

Code.Name: Copy accounting voucher
Code.Description: To indicate that the document/message justifying an accounting entry is a copy.

Code.Name: Pro-forma accounting voucher
Code.Description: To indicate that the document/message justifying an accounting entry is pro-forma.

Code.Name: International Ship Security Certificate
Code.Description: A certificate on ship security issued based on the International code for the Security of Ships and of Port facilities (ISPS code).

Code.Name: Interim International Ship Security Certificate
Code.Description: An interim certificate on ship security issued basis under the International code for the Security of Ships and of Port facilities (ISPS code).

Code.Name: Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP) Certificate
Code.Description: Certificate that guarantees quality manufacturing and processing of food products, medications, cosmetics, etc.

Code.Name: Framework Agreement
Code.Description: An agreement between one or more contracting authorities and one or more economic operators, the purpose of which is to establish the terms governing contracts to be awarded during a given period, in particular with regard to price and, where appropriate, the quantity envisaged.

Code.Name: Insurance declaration sheet (bordereau)
Code.Description: A document/message used when an insured reports to his insurer details of individual shipments which are covered by an insurance contract - an open cover or a floating policy - between the parties.

Code.Name: Transport capacity offer
Code.Description: Offering of capacity for the transport of goods for a date and a route.

Code.Name: Ship Security Plan
Code.Description: Ship Security Plan (SSP) is a document prepared in terms of the ISPS Code to contribute to the prevention of illegal acts against the ship and its crew.

Code.Name: Forwarder�s invoice discrepancy report
Code.Description: Document/message reporting invoice discrepancies indentified by the forwarder.

Code.Name: Storage capacity offer
Code.Description: Offering of capacity to store goods.

Code.Name: Insurer's invoice
Code.Description: Document/message issued by an insurer specifying the cost of an insurance which has been effected and claiming payment therefore.

Code.Name: Storage capacity request
Code.Description: Request for capacity to store goods.

Code.Name: Transport capacity request
Code.Description: Request for capacity for the transport of goods for a date and a route.

Code.Name: EU Customs declaration for External Community Transit (T1)
Code.Description: Customs declaration for goods under the external Community/common transit procedure. This applies to "non-Community goods" ("T1" under EU legislation and EC- EFTA "Transit Convention").

Code.Name: EU Customs declaration for internal Community Transit (T2)
Code.Description: Customs declaration for goods under the internal Community/common transit procedure. This applies to "Community goods" ("T2" under EU legislation and EC-EFTA "Transit Convention").

Code.Name: Cover note
Code.Description: Document/message issued by an insurer (insurance broker, agent, etc.) to notify the insured that his insurance have been carried out.

Code.Name: EU Customs declaration for non-fiscal area internal
Code.Description: Community Transit (T2F) Declaration for goods under the internal Community transit procedure in the context of trade between the "VAT" territory of EU Member States and EU territories where the VAT rules do not apply, such as Canary islands, some French overseas territories, the Channel islands and the Aaland islands, and between those territories. ("T2F" under EU Legislation).

Code.Name: EU Customs declaration for internal transit to San Marino
Code.Description: (T2SM) Customs declaration for goods under the internal Community transit procedure between the Community and San Marino. ("T2SM" under EU Legislation).

Code.Name: EU Customs declaration for mixed consignments (T)
Code.Description: Customs declaration for goods under the Community/common transit procedure for mixed consignments (i.e. consignments that comprise goods of different statuses, like "T1" and "T2") ("T" under EU Legislation).

Code.Name: EU Document for establishing the Community status of goods
Code.Description: (T2L) Form establishing the Community status of goods ("T2L" under EU Legislation).

Code.Name: EU Document for establishing the Community status of goods
Code.Description: for certain fiscal purposes (T2LF) Form establishing the Community status of goods in the context of trade between the "VAT" territory of EU Member States and EU territories where the VAT rules do not apply, such as Canary islands, some French overseas territories, the Channel islands and the Aaland islands, and between those territories ("T2LF" under EU Legislation).

Code.Name: Document for establishing the Customs Status of goods for
Code.Description: San Marino (T2LSM) Form establishing the Community status of goods ("T2L" under European Legislation) in the context of trade between the EU and San Marino. ("T2LSM" under EU Legislation).

Code.Name: Customs declaration for TIR Carnet goods
Code.Description: A Customs declaration in which goods move under cover of TIR Carnets.

Code.Name: Transport Means Security Report
Code.Description: A document reporting the security status and related information of a means of transport.

Code.Name: Halal Slaughtering Certificate
Code.Description: A certificate verifying that meat has been produced from slaughter in accordance with Islamic laws and practices.

Code.Name: Forwarding instructions
Code.Description: Document/message issued to a freight forwarder, giving instructions regarding the action to be taken by the forwarder for the forwarding of goods described therein.

Code.Name: Forwarder's advice to import agent
Code.Description: Document/message issued by a freight forwarder in an exporting country advising his counterpart in an importing country about the forwarding of goods described therein.

Code.Name: Forwarder's advice to exporter
Code.Description: Document/message issued by a freight forwarder informing an exporter of the action taken in fulfillment of instructions received.

Code.Name: Forwarder's invoice
Code.Description: Invoice issued by a freight forwarder specifying services rendered and costs incurred and claiming payment therefore.

Code.Name: Forwarder's certificate of receipt
Code.Description: Non-negotiable document issued by a forwarder to certify that he has assumed control of a specified consignment, with irrevocable instructions to send it to the consignee indicated in the document or to hold it at his disposal. E.g. FIATA-FCR.

Code.Name: Heat Treatment Certificate
Code.Description: A certificate verifying the heat treatment of the product is in conformance with international standards to ensure the product�s healthiness and/or shows the mode of heat treatment indicating the temperature and the amount of time the product or raw material used in the product was treated (such as milk).

Code.Name: Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of
Code.Description: Wild Fauna and Flora (CITES) Certificate A certificate used in the trade of endangered species in accordance with the CITES convention.

Code.Name: Free Sale Certificate in the Country of Origin
Code.Description: A certificate confirming that a specified product is free for sale in the country of origin.

Code.Name: Transit license
Code.Description: Document/message issued by the competent body in accordance with transit regulations in force, by which authorization is granted to a party to move articles under customs procedure.

Code.Name: Veterinary quarantine certificate
Code.Description: A certification that livestock or animal products, that are either imported or entering free zones, are kept under health supervision for a time period determined by veterinary quarantine instructions.

Code.Name: Shipping note
Code.Description: (1123) Document/message provided by the shipper or his agent to the carrier, multimodal transport operator, terminal or other receiving authority, giving information about export consignments offered for transport, and providing for the necessary receipts and declarations of liability. Sometimes a multipurpose cargo handling document also fulfilling the functions of document 632, 633, 650 and 655.

Code.Name: Forwarder's warehouse receipt
Code.Description: Document/message issued by a forwarder acting as Warehouse Keeper acknowledging receipt of goods placed in a warehouse, and stating or referring to the conditions which govern the warehousing and the release of goods. The document contains detailed provisions regarding the rights of holders-by-endorsement, transfer of ownership, etc. E.g. FIATA-FWR.

Code.Name: Goods receipt
Code.Description: Document/message to acknowledge the receipt of goods and in addition may indicate receiving conditions.

Code.Name: Port charges documents
Code.Description: Documents/messages specifying services rendered, storage and handling costs, demurrage and other charges due to the owner of goods described therein.

Code.Name: Certified list of ingredients
Code.Description: A document legalized from a competent authority that shows the components of the product (food additive, detergent, disinfectant and sanitizer).

Code.Name: Warehouse warrant
Code.Description: Negotiable receipt document, issued by a Warehouse Keeper to a person placing goods in a warehouse and conferring title to the goods stored.

Code.Name: Health certificate
Code.Description: A document legalized from a competent authority that shows that the product has been tested microbiologically and is free from any pathogens and fit for human consumption and/or declares that the product is in compliance with sanitary and phytosanitary measures.

Code.Name: Food grade certificate
Code.Description: A document that shows that the product (food additive, detergent, disinfectant and sanitizer) is suitable to be used in the food industry.

Code.Name: Certificate of suitability for transport of grains and
Code.Description: legumes Certificate of inspection for the vessel stating its readiness and suitability for transporting grains and legumes.

Code.Name: Certificate of refrigerated transport equipment inspection
Code.Description: Inspection document shows that the container, the cooling devices and measured temperature is in good working condition.

Code.Name: Delivery order
Code.Description: Document/message issued by a party entitled to authorize the release of goods specified therein to a named consignee, to be retained by the custodian of the goods.

Code.Name: Thermographic reading report
Code.Description: A report of temperature readings over a period.

Code.Name: Certificate of food item transport readiness
Code.Description: A certificate to verify readiness of a transport or transport area such as a reservoir or hold to transport food items.

Code.Name: Food packaging contact certificate
Code.Description: A document legalized from a competent authority that shows that the food packaging product is safe to come into contact with food.

Code.Name: Packaging material composition report
Code.Description: A document that shows the main structure that composes the packaging material.

Code.Name: Export price certificate
Code.Description: A certification executed by the competent authority from country of exportation stating the export price of the goods.

Code.Name: Public price certificate
Code.Description: A certification executed by the competent authority from country of production stating the price of the goods to the general public.

Code.Name: Drug shelf life study report
Code.Description: A document containing results from the study which determines the shelf life, namely the time period of storage at a specified condition within which a drug substance or drug product still meets its established specifications; its identity, strength, quality and purity.

Code.Name: Certificate of compliance with standards of the World
Code.Description: Organization for Animal Health (OIE) A certification that the products have been treated in a way consistent with the standards set by the World Organization for Animal Health (OIE).

Code.Name: Production facility license
Code.Description: A license granted by a competent authority to a production facility for manufacturing specific products.

Code.Name: Handling order
Code.Description: Document/message issued by a cargo handling organization (port administration, terminal operator, etc.) for the removal or other handling of goods under their care.

Code.Name: Manufacturing license
Code.Description: A license granted by a competent authority to a manufacturer for production of specific products.

Code.Name: Low risk country formal letter
Code.Description: An official letter issued by an import authority granted to the importer of goods from a low risk country which allows the importer to place its products in the local market with certain favorable considerations.

Code.Name: Previous correspondence
Code.Description: Correspondence previously exchanged.

Code.Name: Declaration for radioactive material
Code.Description: A declaration to be presented to the competent authority when radioactive material moves cross-border.

Code.Name: Gate pass
Code.Description: Document/message authorizing goods specified therein to be brought out of a fenced-in port or terminal area.

Code.Name: Resale information
Code.Description: Document/message providing information on a resale.

Code.Name: Phytosanitary Re-export Certificate
Code.Description: A message/document consistent with the model for re- export phytosanitary certificates of the IPPC, attesting that a consignment meets phytosanitary import requirements.

Code.Name: Bayplan/stowage plan, full
Code.Description: A full bayplan containing all occupied and/or blocked stowage locations.

Code.Name: Bayplan/stowage plan, partial
Code.Description: A partial bayplan. containing only a selected part of the available stowage locations.

Code.Name: Waybill
Code.Description: Non-negotiable document evidencing the contract for the transport of cargo.

Code.Name: Universal (multipurpose) transport document
Code.Description: Document/message evidencing a contract of carriage covering the movement of goods by any mode of transport, or combination of modes, for national as well as international transport, under any applicable international convention or national law and under the conditions of carriage of any carrier or transport operator undertaking or arranging the transport referred to in the document.

Code.Name: Goods receipt, carriage
Code.Description: Document/message issued by a carrier or a carrier's agent, acknowledging receipt for carriage of goods specified therein on conditions stated or referred to in the document, enabling the carrier to issue a transport document.

Code.Name: House waybill
Code.Description: The document made out by an agent/consolidator which evidences the contract between the shipper and the agent/consolidator for the arrangement of carriage of goods.

Code.Name: Master bill of lading
Code.Description: A bill of lading issued by the master of a vessel (in actuality the owner or charterer of the vessel). It could cover a number of house bills.

Code.Name: Bill of lading
Code.Description: Negotiable document/message which evidences a contract of carriage by sea and the taking over or loading of goods by carrier, and by which carrier undertakes to deliver goods against surrender of the document. A provision in the document that goods are to be delivered to the order of a named person, or to order, or to bearer, constitutes such an undertaking.

Code.Name: Bill of lading original
Code.Description: The original of the bill of lading issued by a transport company. When issued by the maritime industry it could signify ownership of the cargo.

Code.Name: Bill of lading copy
Code.Description: A copy of the bill of lading issued by a transport company.

Code.Name: Empty container bill
Code.Description: Bill of lading indicating an empty container.

Code.Name: Tanker bill of lading
Code.Description: Document which evidences a transport of liquid bulk cargo.

Code.Name: Sea waybill
Code.Description: Non-negotiable document which evidences a contract for the carriage of goods by sea and the taking over of the goods by the carrier, and by which the carrier undertakes to deliver the goods to the consignee named in the document.

Code.Name: Inland waterway bill of lading
Code.Description: Negotiable transport document made out to a named person, to order or to bearer, signed by the carrier and handed to the sender after receipt of the goods.

Code.Name: Non-negotiable maritime transport document (generic)
Code.Description: Non-negotiable document which evidences a contract for the carriage of goods by sea and the taking over or loading of the goods by the carrier, and by which the carrier undertakes to deliver the goods to the consignee named in the document. E.g. Sea waybill. Remark: Synonymous with "straight" or "non-negotiable Bill of lading" used in certain countries, e.g. Canada.

Code.Name: Mate's receipt
Code.Description: Document/message issued by a ship's officer to acknowledge that a specified consignment has been received on board a vessel, and the apparent condition of the goods; enabling the carrier to issue a Bill of lading.

Code.Name: House bill of lading
Code.Description: The bill of lading issued not by the carrier but by the freight forwarder/consolidator known by the carrier.

Code.Name: Letter of indemnity for non-surrender of bill of lading
Code.Description: Document/message issued by a commercial party or a bank of an insurance company accepting responsibility to the beneficiary of the indemnity in accordance with the terms thereof.

Code.Name: Forwarder's bill of lading
Code.Description: Non-negotiable document issued by a freight forwarder evidencing a contract for the carriage of goods by sea and the taking over or loading of the goods by the freight forwarder, and by which the freight forwarder undertakes to deliver the goods to the consignee named in the document.

Code.Name: Residence permit
Code.Description: A document authorizing residence.

Code.Name: Seaman�s book
Code.Description: A national identity document issued to professional seamen that contains a record of their rank and service career.

Code.Name: General message
Code.Description: Document/message providing agreed textual information.

Code.Name: Rail consignment note (generic term)
Code.Description: Transport document constituting a contract for the carriage of goods between the sender and the carrier (the railway). For international rail traffic, this document must conform to the model prescribed by the international conventions concerning carriage of goods by rail, e.g. CIM Convention, SMGS Convention.

Code.Name: Product data response
Code.Description: Document/message responding to a previously received Product Data document/message.

Code.Name: Road list-SMGS
Code.Description: Accounting document, one copy of which is drawn up for each consignment note; it accompanies the consignment over the whole route and is a rail transport document.

Code.Name: Escort official recognition
Code.Description: Document/message which gives right to the owner to exert all functions normally transferred to a guard in a train by which an escorted consignment is transported.

Code.Name: Recharging document
Code.Description: Fictitious transport document regarding a previous transport, enabling a carrier's agent to give to another carrier's agent (in a different country) the possibility to collect charges relating to the original transport (rail environment).

Code.Name: Manufacturer raised order
Code.Description: Document/message providing details of an order which has been raised by a manufacturer.

Code.Name: Manufacturer raised consignment order
Code.Description: Document/message providing details of a consignment order which has been raised by a manufacturer.

Code.Name: Price/sales catalogue not containing commercial information
Code.Description: A price/sales catalogue message containing no commercial information, such as prices, terms or conditions.

Code.Name: Price/sales catalogue containing commercial information
Code.Description: A price/sales catalogue message containing only commercial terms or conditions data.

Code.Name: Returns advice
Code.Description: Document/message by means of which the buyer informs the seller about the despatch of returned goods.

Code.Name: Road consignment note
Code.Description: Transport document/message which evidences a contract between a carrier and a sender for the carriage of goods by road (generic term). Remark: For international road traffic, this document must contain at least the particulars prescribed by the convention on the contract for the international carriage of goods by road (CMR).

Code.Name: Commercial account summary
Code.Description: A message enabling the transmission of commercial data concerning payments made and outstanding items on an account over a period of time.

Code.Name: Announcement for returns
Code.Description: A message by which a party announces to another party details of goods for return due to specified reasons (e.g. returns for repair, returns because of damage, etc).

Code.Name: Instruction for returns
Code.Description: A message by which a party informs another party whether and how goods shall be returned.

Code.Name: Sales forecast report
Code.Description: A message enabling companies to exchange or report electronically, basic sales forecast data related to products or services, including the corresponding location, time period, product identification, pricing and quantity information. It enables the recip.

Code.Name: Sales data report
Code.Description: A message enabling companies to exchange or report electronically, basic sales data related to products or services, including the corresponding location, time period, product identification, pricing and quantity information. It enables the recipient to p.

Code.Name: Standing inquiry on complete product information
Code.Description: A product inquiry which stands until it is cancelled. It requests not only the updates since last time, but always the complete product information of a data supplier. This means that within the standing request every time a complete download of the respe.

Code.Name: Proof of delivery
Code.Description: A message by which a consignee provides for a carrier proof of delivery of a consignment.

Code.Name: Cargo/goods handling and movement message
Code.Description: A message from a party to a warehouse, distribution centre, or logistics service provider identifying the handling services and where required the movement of specified goods, limited to warehouses within the jurisdiction of the distribution centre or log.

Code.Name: Metered services consumption report supporting an invoice
Code.Description: Document/message providing metered consumption details supporiting an invoice.

Code.Name: Air waybill
Code.Description: Document/message made out by or on behalf of the shipper which evidences the contract between the shipper and carrier(s) for carriage of goods over routes of the carrier(s) and which is identified by the airline prefix issuing the document plus a serial (IATA).

Code.Name: Master air waybill
Code.Description: Document/message made out by or on behalf of the agent/consolidator which evidences the contract between the agent/consolidator and carrier(s) for carriage of goods over routes of the carrier(s) for a consignment consisting of goods originated by more than one shipper (IATA).

Code.Name: Metered services consumption report
Code.Description: Document/message providing metered consumption details.

Code.Name: Substitute air waybill
Code.Description: A temporary air waybill which contains only limited information because of the absence of the original.

Code.Name: Crew's effects declaration
Code.Description: Declaration to Customs regarding the personal effects of crew members aboard the conveyance; equivalent to IMO FAL 4.

Code.Name: Passenger list
Code.Description: Declaration to Customs regarding passengers aboard the conveyance; equivalent to IMO FAL 6.

Code.Name: Delivery notice (rail transport)
Code.Description: Document/message created by the consignor or by the departure station, joined to the transport or sent to the consignee, giving the possibility to the consignee or the arrival station to attest the delivery of the goods. The document must be returned to the consignor or to the departure station.

Code.Name: Payroll deductions advice
Code.Description: A message sent by a party (usually an employer or its representative) to a service providing organisation, to detail payroll deductions paid on behalf of its employees to the service providing organisation.

Code.Name: Consignment despatch advice
Code.Description: Document/message by means of which the supplier informs the buyer about the despatch of goods ordered on consignment (goods to be delivered into stock with agreement on payment when goods are sold out of this stock).

Code.Name: Transport equipment gross mass verification message
Code.Description: Message containing information regarding gross mass verification of transport equipment.

Code.Name: Despatch note (post parcels)
Code.Description: Document/message which, according to Article 106 of the "Agreement concerning Postal Parcels" under the UPU convention, is to accompany post parcels.

Code.Name: Invoice information for accounting purposes
Code.Description: A document / message containing accounting related information such as monetary summations, seller id and VAT information. This may not be a complete invoice according to legal requirements. For instance the line item information might be excluded.

Code.Name: Multimodal/combined transport document (generic)
Code.Description: A transport document used when more than one mode of transportation is involved in the movement of cargo. It is a contract of carriage and receipt of the cargo for a multimodal transport. It indicates the place where the responsible transport company in the move takes responsibility for the cargo, the place where the responsibility of this transport company in the move ends and the conveyances involved.

Code.Name: Through bill of lading
Code.Description: Bill of lading which evidences a contract of carriage from one place to another in separate stages of which at least one stage is a sea transit, and by which the issuing carrier accepts responsibility for the carriage as set forth in the through bill of lading.

Code.Name: Forwarder's certificate of transport
Code.Description: Negotiable document/message issued by a forwarder to certify that he has taken charge of a specified consignment for despatch and delivery in accordance with the consignor's instructions, as indicated in the document, and that he accepts responsibility for delivery of the goods to the holder of the document through the intermediary of a delivery agent of his choice. E.g. FIATA-FCT.

Code.Name: Combined transport document (generic)
Code.Description: Negotiable or non-negotiable document evidencing a contract for the performance and/or procurement of performance of combined transport of goods and bearing on its face either the heading "Negotiable combined transport document issued subject to Uniform Rules for a Combined Transport Document (ICC Brochure No. 298)" or the heading "Non-negotiable Combined Transport Document issued subject to Uniform Rules for a Combined Transport Document (ICC Brochure No. 298)".

Code.Name: Multimodal transport document (generic)
Code.Description: Document/message which evidences a multimodal transport contract, the taking in charge of the goods by the multimodal transport operator, and an undertaking by him to deliver the goods in accordance with the terms of the contract. (International Convention on Multimodal Transport of Goods).

Code.Name: Combined transport bill of lading/multimodal bill of lading
Code.Description: Document which evidences a multimodal transport contract, the taking in charge of the goods by the multimodal transport operator, and an undertaking by him to deliver the goods in accordance with the terms of the contract.

Code.Name: Booking confirmation
Code.Description: Document/message issued by a carrier to confirm that space has been reserved for a consignment in means of transport.

Code.Name: Calling forward notice
Code.Description: Instructions for release or delivery of goods.

Code.Name: Freight invoice
Code.Description: Document/message issued by a transport operation specifying freight costs and charges incurred for a transport operation and stating conditions of payment.

Code.Name: Arrival notice (goods)
Code.Description: Notification from the carrier to the consignee in writing, by telephone or by any other means (express letter, message, telegram, etc.) informing him that a consignment addressed to him is being or will shortly be held at his disposal at a specified point in the place of destination.

Code.Name: Notice of circumstances preventing delivery (goods)
Code.Description: Request made by the carrier to the sender, or, as the case may be, the consignee, for instructions as to the disposal of the consignment when circumstances prevent delivery and the return of the goods has not been requested by the consignor in the transport document.

Code.Name: Notice of circumstances preventing transport (goods)
Code.Description: Request made by the carrier to the sender, or, the consignee as the case may be, for instructions as to the disposal of the goods when circumstances prevent transport before departure or en route, after acceptance of the consignment concerned.

Code.Name: Delivery notice (goods)
Code.Description: Notification in writing, sent by the carrier to the sender, to inform him at his request of the actual date of delivery of the goods.

Code.Name: Cargo manifest
Code.Description: Listing of goods comprising the cargo carried in a means of transport or in a transport-unit. The cargo manifest gives the commercial particulars of the goods, such as transport document numbers, consignors, consignees, shipping marks, number and kind of packages and descriptions and quantities of the goods.

Code.Name: Freight manifest
Code.Description: Document/message containing the same information as a cargo manifest, and additional details on freight amounts, charges, etc.

Code.Name: Bordereau
Code.Description: Document/message used in road transport, listing the cargo carried on a road vehicle, often referring to appended copies of Road consignment note.

Code.Name: Container manifest (unit packing list)
Code.Description: Document/message specifying the contents of particular freight containers or other transport units, prepared by the party responsible for their loading into the container or unit.

Code.Name: Charges note
Code.Description: Document used by the rail organization to indicate freight charges or additional charges in each case where the departure station is not able to calculate the charges for the total voyage (e.g. tariff not yet updated, part of voyage not covered by the tariff). This document must be considered as joined to the transport.

Code.Name: Advice of collection
Code.Description: (1030) Document that is joined to the transport or sent by separate means, giving to the departure rail organization the proof that the cash-on delivery amount has been encashed by the arrival rail organization before reimbursement of the consignor.

Code.Name: Safety of ship certificate
Code.Description: Document certifying a ship's safety to a specified date.

Code.Name: Safety of radio certificate
Code.Description: Document certifying the safety of a ship's radio facilities to a specified date.

Code.Name: Safety of equipment certificate
Code.Description: Document certifying the safety of a ship's equipment to a specified date.

Code.Name: Civil liability for oil certificate
Code.Description: Document declaring a ship owner's liability for oil propelling or carried on a vessel.

Code.Name: Loadline document
Code.Description: Document specifying the limit of a ship's legal submersion under various conditions.

Code.Name: Derat document
Code.Description: Document certifying that a ship is free of rats, valid to a specified date.

Code.Name: Maritime declaration of health
Code.Description: Document certifying the health condition on board a vessel, valid to a specified date.

Code.Name: Certificate of registry
Code.Description: Official certificate stating the vessel's registry.

Code.Name: Ship's stores declaration
Code.Description: Declaration to Customs regarding the contents of the ship's stores (equivalent to IMO FAL 3) i.e. goods intended for consumption by passengers/crew on board vessels, aircraft or trains, whether or not sold or landed; goods necessary for operation/maintenance of conveyance, including fuel/lubricants, excluding spare parts/equipment (IMO).

Code.Name: Export licence, application for
Code.Description: Application for a permit issued by a government authority permitting exportation of a specified commodity subject to specified conditions as quantity, country of destination, etc.

Code.Name: Export licence
Code.Description: Permit issued by a government authority permitting exportation of a specified commodity subject to specified conditions as quantity, country of destination, etc. Synonym: Embargo permit.

Code.Name: Exchange control declaration, export
Code.Description: Document/message completed by an exporter/seller as a means whereby the competent body may control that the amount of foreign exchange accrued from a trade transaction is repatriated in accordance with the conditions of payment and exchange control regulations in force.

Code.Name: Despatch note model T
Code.Description: European community transit declaration.

Code.Name: Despatch note model T1
Code.Description: Transit declaration for goods circulating under internal community transit procedures (between European Union (EU) countries).

Code.Name: Despatch note model T2
Code.Description: Ascertainment that the declared goods were originally produced in an European Union (EU) country.

Code.Name: Control document T5
Code.Description: Control document (export declaration) used particularly in case of re-sending without use with only VAT collection, refusal, unconformity with contract etc.

Code.Name: Re-sending consignment note
Code.Description: Rail consignment note prepared by the consignor for the facilitation of an eventual return to the origin of the goods.

Code.Name: Despatch note model T2L
Code.Description: Ascertainment that the declared goods were originally produced in an European Union (EU) country. May only be used for goods that are loaded on one single means of transport in one single departure point for one single delivery point.

Code.Name: Goods declaration for exportation
Code.Description: Document/message by which goods are declared for export Customs clearance, conforming to the layout key set out at Appendix I to Annex C.1 concerning outright exportation to the Kyoto convention (CCC). Within a Customs union, "for despatch" may have the same meaning as "for exportation".

Code.Name: Cargo declaration (departure)
Code.Description: Generic term, sometimes referred to as Freight declaration, applied to the documents providing the particulars required by the Customs concerning the cargo (freight) carried by commercial means of transport (CCC).

Code.Name: Application for goods control certificate
Code.Description: Document/message submitted to a competent body by party requesting a Goods control certificate to be issued in accordance with national or international standards, or conforming to legislation in the importing country, or as specified in the contract.

Code.Name: Goods control certificate
Code.Description: Document/message issued by a competent body evidencing the quality of the goods described therein, in accordance with national or international standards, or conforming to legislation in the importing country, or as specified in the contract.

Code.Name: Application for phytosanitary certificate
Code.Description: Document/message submitted to a competent body by party requesting a Phytosanitary certificate to be issued.

Code.Name: Phytosanitary certificate
Code.Description: A message/doucment consistent with the model for certificates of the IPPC, attesting that a consignment meets phytosanitary import requirements.

Code.Name: Sanitary certificate
Code.Description: Document/message issued by the competent authority in the exporting country evidencing that alimentary and animal products, including dead animals, are fit for human consumption, and giving details, when relevant, of controls undertaken.

Code.Name: Veterinary certificate
Code.Description: Document/message issued by the competent authority in the exporting country evidencing that live animals or birds are not infested or infected with disease, and giving details regarding their provenance, and of vaccinations and other treatment to which they have been subjected.

Code.Name: Application for inspection certificate
Code.Description: Document/message submitted to a competent body by a party requesting an Inspection certificate to be issued in accordance with national or international standards, or conforming to legislation in the country in which it is required, or as specified in the contract.

Code.Name: Inspection certificate
Code.Description: Document/message issued by a competent body evidencing that the goods described therein have been inspected in accordance with national or international standards, in conformity with legislation in the country in which the inspection is required, or as specified in the contract.

Code.Name: Certificate of origin, application for
Code.Description: Document/message submitted to a competent body by an interested party requesting a Certificate of origin to be issued in accordance with relevant criteria, and on the basis of evidence of the origin of the goods.

Code.Name: Certificate of origin
Code.Description: Document/message identifying goods, in which the authority or body authorized to issue it certifies expressly that the goods to which the certificate relates originate in a specific country. The word "country" may include a group of countries, a region or a part of a country. This certificate may also include a declaration by the manufacturer, producer, supplier, exporter or other competent person.

Code.Name: Declaration of origin
Code.Description: Appropriate statement as to the origin of the goods, made in connection with their exportation by the manufacturer, producer, supplier, exporter or other competent person on the Commercial invoice or any other document relating to the goods (CCC).

Code.Name: Regional appellation certificate
Code.Description: Certificate drawn up in accordance with the rules laid down by an authority or approved body, certifying that the goods described therein qualify for a designation specific to the given region (e.g. champagne, port wine, Parmesan cheese).

Code.Name: Preference certificate of origin
Code.Description: Document/message describing a certificate of origin meeting the requirements for preferential treatment.

Code.Name: Certificate of origin form GSP
Code.Description: Specific form of certificate of origin for goods qualifying for preferential treatment under the generalized system of preferences (includes a combined declaration of origin and certificate, form A).

Code.Name: Consular invoice
Code.Description: Document/message to be prepared by an exporter in his country and presented to a diplomatic representation of the importing country for endorsement and subsequently to be presented by the importer in connection with the import of the goods described therein.

Code.Name: Dangerous goods declaration
Code.Description: (1115) Document/message issued by a consignor in accordance with applicable conventions or regulations, describing hazardous goods or materials for transport purposes, and stating that the latter have been packed and labelled in accordance with the provisions of the relevant conventions or regulations.

Code.Name: Statistical document, export
Code.Description: Document/message in which an exporter provides information about exported goods required by the body responsible for the collection of international trade statistics.

Code.Name: INTRASTAT declaration
Code.Description: Document/message in which a declarant provides information about goods required by the body responsible for the collection of trade statistics.

Code.Name: Delivery verification certificate
Code.Description: Document/message whereby an official authority (Customs or governmental) certifies that goods have been delivered.

Code.Name: Import licence, application for
Code.Description: Document/message in which an interested party applies to the competent body for authorization to import either a limited quantity of articles subject to import restrictions, or an unlimited quantity of such articles during a limited period, and specifies the kind of articles, their origin and value, etc.

Code.Name: Import licence
Code.Description: Document/message issued by the competent body in accordance with import regulations in force, by which authorization is granted to a named party to import either a limited quantity of designated articles or an unlimited quantity of such articles during a limited period, under conditions specified in the document.

Code.Name: Customs declaration without commercial detail
Code.Description: CUSDEC transmission that does not include data from the commercial detail section of the message.

Code.Name: Customs declaration with commercial and item detail
Code.Description: CUSDEC transmission that includes data from both the commercial detail and item detail sections of the message.

Code.Name: Customs declaration without item detail
Code.Description: CUSDEC transmission that does not include data from the item detail section of the message.

Code.Name: Related document
Code.Description: Document that has a relationship with the stated document/message.

Code.Name: Receipt (Customs)
Code.Description: Receipt for Customs duty/tax/fee paid.

Code.Name: Application for exchange allocation
Code.Description: Document/message whereby an importer/buyer requests the competent body to allocate an amount of foreign exchange to be transferred to an exporter/seller in payment for goods.

Code.Name: Foreign exchange permit
Code.Description: Document/message issued by the competent body authorizing an importer/buyer to transfer an amount of foreign exchange to an exporter/seller in payment for goods.

Code.Name: Exchange control declaration (import)
Code.Description: Document/message completed by an importer/buyer as a means for the competent body to control that a trade transaction for which foreign exchange has been allocated has been executed and that money has been transferred in accordance with the conditions of payment and the exchange control regulations in force.

Code.Name: Goods declaration for importation
Code.Description: Document/message by which goods are declared for import Customs clearance [sister entry of 830].

Code.Name: Goods declaration for home use
Code.Description: Document/message by which goods are declared for import Customs clearance according to Annex B.1 (concerning clearance for home use) to the Kyoto convention (CCC).

Code.Name: Customs immediate release declaration
Code.Description: Document/message issued by an importer notifying Customs that goods have been removed from an importing means of transport to the importer's premises under a Customs- approved arrangement for immediate release, or requesting authorization to do so.

Code.Name: Customs delivery note
Code.Description: Document/message whereby a Customs authority releases goods under its control to be placed at the disposal of the party concerned. Synonym: Customs release note.

Code.Name: Cargo declaration (arrival)
Code.Description: Generic term, sometimes referred to as Freight declaration, applied to the documents providing the particulars required by the Customs concerning the cargo (freight) carried by commercial means of transport (CCC).

Code.Name: Value declaration
Code.Description: Document/message in which a declarant (importer) states the invoice or other price (e.g. selling price, price of identical goods), and specifies costs for freight, insurance and packing, etc., terms of delivery and payment, any relationship with the trading partner, etc., for the purpose of determining the Customs value of goods imported.

Code.Name: Customs invoice
Code.Description: Document/message required by the Customs in an importing country in which an exporter states the invoice or other price (e.g. selling price, price of identical goods), and specifies costs for freight, insurance and packing, etc., terms of delivery and payment, for the purpose of determining the Customs value in the importing country of goods consigned to that country.

Code.Name: Customs declaration (post parcels)
Code.Description: Document/message which, according to Article 106 of the "Agreement concerning Postal Parcels" under the UPU Convention, must accompany post parcels and in which the contents of such parcels are specified.

Code.Name: Tax declaration (value added tax)
Code.Description: Document/message in which an importer states the pertinent information required by the competent body for assessment of value-added tax.

Code.Name: Tax declaration (general)
Code.Description: Document/message containing a general tax declaration.

Code.Name: Tax demand
Code.Description: Document/message containing the demand of tax.

Code.Name: Embargo permit
Code.Description: Document/message giving the permission to export specified goods.

Code.Name: Goods declaration for Customs transit
Code.Description: Document/message by which the sender declares goods for Customs transit according to Annex E.1 (concerning Customs transit) to the Kyoto convention (CCC).

Code.Name: TIF form
Code.Description: International Customs transit document by which the sender declares goods for carriage by rail in accordance with the provisions of the 1952 International Convention to facilitate the crossing of frontiers for goods carried by rail (TIF Convention of UIC).

Code.Name: TIR carnet
Code.Description: International Customs document (International Transit by Road), issued by a guaranteeing association approved by the Customs authorities, under the cover of which goods are carried, in most cases under Customs seal, in road vehicles and/or containers in compliance with the requirements of the Customs TIR Convention of the International Transport of Goods under cover of TIR Carnets (UN/ECE).

Code.Name: EC carnet
Code.Description: EC customs transit document issued by EC customs authorities for transit and/or temporary user of goods within the EC.

Code.Name: EUR 1 certificate of origin
Code.Description: Customs certificate used in preferential goods interchanges between EC countries and EC external countries.

Code.Name: ATA carnet
Code.Description: International Customs document (Admission Temporaire / Temporary Admission) which, issued under the terms of the ATA Convention (1961), incorporates an internationally valid guarantee and may be used, in lieu of national Customs documents and as security for import duties and taxes, to cover the temporary admission of goods and, where appropriate, the transit of goods. If accepted for controlling the temporary export and reimport of goods, international guarantee does not apply (CCC).

Code.Name: Single administrative document
Code.Description: A set of documents, replacing the various (national) forms for Customs declaration within the EC, implemented on 01-01-1988.

Code.Name: General response (Customs)
Code.Description: General response message to permit the transfer of data from Customs to the transmitter of the previous message.

Code.Name: Document response (Customs)
Code.Description: Document response message to permit the transfer of data from Customs to the transmitter of the previous message.

Code.Name: Error response (Customs)
Code.Description: Error response message to permit the transfer of data from Customs to the transmitter of the previous message.

Code.Name: Package response (Customs)
Code.Description: Package response message to permit the transfer of data from Customs to the transmitter of the previous message.

Code.Name: Tax calculation/confirmation response (Customs)
Code.Description: Tax calculation/confirmation response message to permit the transfer of data from Customs to the transmitter of the previous message.

Code.Name: Quota prior allocation certificate
Code.Description: Document/message issued by the competent body for prior allocation of a quota.

Code.Name: Wagon report
Code.Description: Document which contains consignment information concerning the wagons and their lading in a case of a multiple wagon consignment.

Code.Name: Transit Conveyor Document
Code.Description: Document for a course of transit used for a carrier who is neither the carrier at the beginning nor the arrival. The transit carrier can directly invoice the expenses for its part of the transport.

Code.Name: Rail consignment note forwarder copy
Code.Description: Document which is a copy of the rail consignment note printed especially for the need of the forwarder.

Code.Name: Duty suspended goods
Code.Description: Document giving details for the carriage of excisable goods on a duty-suspended basis.

Code.Name: Proof of transit declaration
Code.Description: A document providing proof that a transit declaration has been accepted.

Code.Name: Container transfer note
Code.Description: Document for the carriage of containers. Syn: transfer note.

Code.Name: NATO transit document
Code.Description: Customs transit document for the carriage of shipments of the NATO armed forces under Customs supervision.

Code.Name: Transfrontier waste shipment authorization
Code.Description: Document containing the authorization from the relevant authority for the international carriage of waste. Syn: Transfrontier waste shipment permit.

Code.Name: Transfrontier waste shipment movement document
Code.Description: Document certified by the carriers and the consignee to be used for the international carriage of waste.

Code.Name: End use authorization
Code.Description: Document issued by Customs granting the end-use Customs procedure.

Code.Name: Government contract
Code.Description: Document/message describing a contract with a government authority.

Code.Name: Statistical document, import
Code.Description: Document/message describing an import document that is used for statistical purposes.

Code.Name: Application for documentary credit
Code.Description: Message with application for opening of a documentary credit.

Code.Name: Previous Customs document/message
Code.Description: Indication of the previous Customs document/message concerning the same transaction.
